task_description: Fix the 2 TypeScript/ESLint errors in PromptActions.tsx and LayoutAnnotationTab.tsx that are blocking Vercel builds. Set up pre-commit hooks with Husky and lint-staged to automatically run ESLint checks before commits, preventing future build failures. Configure VS Code settings for auto-fix on save, and optionally add GitHub Actions for CI/CD linting.

patterns.husky_pattern: Standard Husky setup with prepare script and lint-staged
patterns.vscode_pattern: ESLint auto-fix on save with codeActionsOnSave

existing_implementations.description: ESLint is already configured with @typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars rule requiring unused vars to match /^_/u pattern
